Package RESTAdmin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminModule
    Admin Module Class Is the central piece of external administartion of zsdn.
    ApplicationConfig
    Application Config Class, required by jersey
    CassandraDB
    CassandraDB access class
    Link
    Container for topo link data used with GSON
    Message
    Container for message data used with GSON
    Module
    Container for module data used with GSON
    Node
    Container for topo node data used with GSON
    RESTMessages
    REST Interface for logging messages access at /RESTAdmin/rest/messages
    RESTMessagesTest
    JUnit tests for the REST Messages tests the REST interface of the messages.
    RESTModules
    REST interface for module management access at Rest /RESTAdmin/rest/modules
    RESTModulesControlTest
    JUnit Tests for RESTAdmin module control tests the REST interface of the modules Requires a locally running zeroZDN setup and a module with the id 0:1 Will actually attempt to enable then disable the stop the module Only recommended for testing if you are ok with the test disabling a module
    RESTModulesTest
    JUnit Tests for the modules tests the REST interface of modules Requires a locally running zeroZDN setup and a module with the id 0:1
    RESTTopology
    REST Interface for logging messages access at /RESTAdmin/rest/topo
    RESTTopologyTest
    JUnit Test Cases for the REST Topology tests the REST interface of the topology.
    TopicToString
    Autogenerated Code.
    ZMFManager
    ZMFManager Creates and manages the AdminModule instance, is started up through web.xml init
